00:00 Yelena, Tarantula & Prowler: Big Villain Reveals for "Spider-Man 4: Brand New Day"
Filming for "Spider-Man: Brand New Day" has been underway since early August – and the rumor mill shows no signs of slowing down. According to well-known insider Daniel Richtman, Florence Pugh is reportedly joining the cast as Yelena Belova after her impressive performance in "Thunderbolts."

02:30 Gandalf and Frodo in "Lord of the Rings: The Hunt for Gollum"
News from Middle-earth: Ian McKellen spoke at a fan event in London about the upcoming live-action film "The Lord of the Rings: The Hunt for Gollum". He talked about two characters in particular: Gandalf and Frodo are once again part of the story – and apparently played by Ian McKellen and Elijah Wood!

04:09 New Trailers
Finall
title: The Best MOVIE NEWS 2025: The Hunt for Gollum, Spider-Man 4, World War Z 2, Scary Movie 6
